long_description: The lightweight Salomon Fast Wing Jacket for men features ClimaWIND(R) Pro fabric to block the wind yet stay breathable during active sports. Plus, it packs small so you can stow it in your pack. Thumbholes allow sleeves to extend over wrists to enhance warmth. Adjustable cuffs feature elastic at wrists to keep wind out; elastic hem. The Salomon Fast Wing Jacket for men features reflective highlights on front and back to improve nighttime visibility.
short_description: The lightweight Salomon Fast Wing Jacket for men features ClimaWIND(R) Pro fabric to block the wind yet stay breathable during active sports. Plus, it packs small so you can stow it in your pack.
